page.title: 20TRADE IN VILLAGE OF TYSOE
page.content: {SHOPS} Grocery stocking wine. Agent for Dry Cleaning. Grocery stocking bread, vegetables. Butcher. Post Office - combined with clothing, footwear, flowers. Hairdresser - male and female. Craft - clogs, smocks, museum. {RESIDENT TRADESMEN} Chimney sweep, coal merchant, floor coverings, electrician, milk delivery, motor engineer, public house, window cleaner, livestock transporter, bakery, carpenter/joiner,craftsman in wood, garage, building contractor. {VISITING TRADESMEN} Central heating oil, newsagent, fresh fish, fish and chips mobile van.
